Name: Jennifer Owen
Profile Details:
Jennifer Owen is our Senior Analyst in Industrials, wagering/gaming, education and childcare.

More than 30 years’ experience in the areas of accountancy, audit, financial markets, treasury and equities research.

Consistently top-rated leisure & gaming analyst while she was a Director of Equities Research at Citigroup and Macquarie Bank.

Governance experience in non-executive director roles in the recreation, hospitality and leisure sectors.

Executive experience in owning and operating childcare centres and principal of Owen Gaming Research.

Name: Graeme Carson
Profile Details:
30-year career in Australian financial markets, both sell-side and buy-side with particular emphasis on industrials (engineering/construction, consumer discretionary, mining services) and diversified financials.

Concurrently Co-founder and Portfolio Manager, Cyan Investment Management (founded 2013).

Head of Industrials Research, Patersons Ltd (2006-2013), industrials analyst, Bell Potter Securities, Macquarie Bank.

Name: Joshua Baker
Profile Details: More than 15 years’ finance industry experience including stints in broking and on the buyside.\r\n\r\nPortfolio manager at HD Capital Partners (formerly Capital H Management) from April 2021 to August 2023
Popup Effect Appearance: with oversight of both the Inception Fund and Active Fund. Buyside experience also includes stints at Paragon Funds management and Zenith Investment Partners as a senior research analyst and PM. Several years sellside experience with Wilson HTM and Whittle & Skok Financial Services covering the resource sector."
